thread.title: Best service ever!
thread.title_full: Best service ever! - Review of Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sherry M
title: Best service ever!
text: Came for 3 nights and stayed for 6 due to snowstorm! Front desk was accommodating and helpful. When we had any need they fulfilled it immediately. Fabian and Marlon were great with suggestions, tickets for the day and generally good people. The breakfast was always well stocked. Close to subway with some nice eateries within walking distance!
